name: GoBot
0:
”Alexa ask Go Bot to add a child”
”Ask Go Bot what's next for Harry”
”Ask Go Bot to reset tasks”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: go bot
des: Go Bot helps your child get ready for school by taking them through a series of tasks they have to complete. To get started, add a child by saying "Alexa, ask Go Bot to add a child". After a child has been added the child can say 'Alexa ask Go Bot what's next for {name}?' and Alexa will ask them if they have completed the next task in their list of To Do tasks. If they answer "Yes" Alexa will ask them if they have completed the next To Do task. If they answer "No" Alexa will instruct them to complete that task. Reset all Done tasks to To Do by saying "Alexa ask Go Bot to reset tasks". To remove a child say "Alexa, ask Go Bot to remove a child".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
